name: Air
description: Focuses on air quality, ventilation, and minimizing pollutants indoors.

name: Water
description: Addresses water quality, accessibility, and hydration.

name: Nourishment
description: Promotes healthy eating habits and access to nutritious food.

name: Light
description: Ensures optimal lighting for health and productivity.

name: Movement
description: Encourages physical activity and reduces sedentary behavior.

name: Thermal Comfort
description: Focuses on maintaining comfortable indoor temperatures.

name: Sound
description: Addresses noise reduction and acoustic comfort.

name: Materials
description: Promotes the use of healthy, sustainable materials.

name: Mind
description: Focuses on mental health, stress reduction, and mindfulness.

name: Community
description: Encourages community engagement, equity, and social interaction.

name: WELL Fundamentals
description: Introduction to the core principles and framework of WELL Building Standards.
